channel.title: Posts on a little bit of everything
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on a little bit of everything

item.title: Some of my favorite vegetarian recipies
item.description: Butternut Squash Risotto Vegan (swap out the butter) total time: ~45 min Leftovers are insane Roasting the squash can take a minute link: https://steffaniebusseyathome.com/home/butternut-squash-risotto/ /// Balsamic Tofu Vegan pretty quick, ~25 min calls for a bunch of herbs and stuff for the marinade/sauce which is kind of a pain. really tasty though. link: https://dishingouthealth.com/balsamic-tofu-20-minutes/ /// Farro Salad Vegan Farro, tomatoes, those little balls of cheese, artichoke hearts, basil, evoo, and whatever else your heart desires.
